H0.text: Libya was a colony of which country from 1911 to 1947. France

H1.text: Libya was a colony of which country from 1911 to 1947. United Kingdom

H2.text: Libya was a colony of which country from 1911 to 1947. Germany

H3.text: Libya was a colony of which country from 1911 to 1947. ItalY

A4.text: Libya was a colony of Italy located in North Africa, in what is now modern Libya, between 1934 and 1943.

A5.text: It was formed from the unification of the colonies of Cyrenaica and Tripolitania, which had been Italian possessions since 1911.
